cont.entity_a: Tack sharp, super-sharp with built-in camera stabilization, remains tack sharp at F1.8, sharp and fast, sharper and faster than Canon and Nikon lenses, sharpest lens at its widest aperture.
cont.entity_b: Superior sharpness compared to 50mm lenses, very sharp on EOS 6D, very sharp and maintains detail when enlarged, razor sharp subject focus, very sharp at f/1.8, very sharp with beautiful bokeh.

cont.entity_a: Gorgeously round bokeh, incredible bokeh, amazing bokeh at f/1.8, outstanding bokeh.
cont.entity_b: Produces silky smooth bokeh with sharpness and virtually no distortion, produces smooth bokeh.

cont.entity_a: Heavy lens not suitable for casual use, best used with a tripod due to its weight.
Very sharp and quick autofocus, not a speed king in focus speed.
cont.entity_b: Exact and fast autofocus, considered the best in Canon's lineup, quick action focus is impressive.

cont.entity_a: Well built and comfortable to handle.
Images rendered beautifully with amazing bokeh at f/1.8, brighter, crisper images than other Sony lenses, regarded as the best lens Sony makes.
cont.entity_b: Image quality is outstanding, sharp images with fast and true focus, excellent image quality.

cont.entity_a: High price tag but delivers quality.
cont.entity_b: Fast and sharp with excellent price, great value for Canon lenses, especially for portraits, great value for money, affordable with high quality.

cont.entity_a: Not a speed king in focus speed.
Excellent for portrait work and astrophotography, suitable for equine photography, favorite lens for portraits, low-light, and action shots.
cont.entity_b: Daily shooter for still and portrait photography, great clarity and telephoto capability for portraits.

cont.entity_a: Super-sharp with built-in camera stabilization for handheld low light use, perfect for hand-held low light photography.
cont.entity_b: Fast f-stop for low light shooting.

cont.entity_a: Sharp and fast with beautiful construction.

cont.entity_b: No lens distortion or chromatic aberration.
No image stabilization but great soft edges effect.
